caption:
“Your scars are your psalms.”

Reflection:
Every wound healed becomes a hymn. Suffering sung back to God turns pain into praise.

Commentary:
This line transforms scars into testimony. The warrior’s faith is measured not by avoidance of battle, but by the grace that follows it.

#VeniFaithful #VeniPublishing #BattleBelongsToTheLord #StandFirm #FaithOverFear #Ephesians611 #FaithAndCourage #DailyDevotional #BibleVerseOfTheDay
